message: Hi Bob, hereâ€™s my offer based on our discount factors. I propose to take $714286 and you get $285714. Accepting now secures you $285714 in full value; delaying into round 2 means your share would drop by 20% per round. I believe this offer fairly reflects our future options. What do you say?

Hi Alice, I understand your logic, but I believe a more equitable split is in order.  I'm proposing a 65/35 split in your favor, acknowledging the discount factors while aiming for a fairer outcome for both of us.
